results.title: Impact of Vitamin D3 on Carbonyl-Oxidative Stress and Matrix Metalloproteinases after Acute Intracerebral Hemorrhage in Rats with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.
results.journal: Endocr Metab Immune Disord Drug Targets
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: The study aimed to evaluate the impact of @CHEMICAL_Cholecalciferol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002762 @@@D3@@@ on the COS-markers and matrix metalloproteinases @GENE_MMP2 @GENE_81686 @@@MMP2@@@/@GENE_MMP9 @GENE_81687 @@@MMP9@@@ activity after acute @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@intracerebral hemorrhage@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@) in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with experimental @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@) compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@).

results.title: Metformin adherence and the risk of cardiovascular disease: a population-based cohort study
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exerts beneficial effects on @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@, including @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ischemic and hemorrhagic@@@) and @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@MI@@@.

results.title: Metformin protects against pericyte apoptosis and promotes neurogenesis through suppressing JNK p38 MAPK signalling activation in ischemia/reperfusion injury.
results.text_hl: Recently investigators have examined the anti-apoptosis effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ in acute @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@Intracerebral hemorrhage@@@, but very little is currently known about how it regulates @DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@-induced pericytes apoptosis and neural stem cells (NSCs) proliferation.

citations.NLM: Liu C, Zhang D, Lu Z, Man J, Zhang Z, Fu X, Cui K, Wang J. Metformin protects against pericyte apoptosis and promotes neurogenesis through suppressing JNK p38 MAPK signalling activation in ischemia/reperfusion injury. Neurosci Lett. 2022 Jul 13;783():136708. PMID: 35660649

results.title: Impact of pre-stroke sulphonylurea and metformin use on mortality of intracerebral haemorrhage.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Pre-@<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@intracerebral haemorrhage@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use was associated with improved outcome in @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@diabetic intracerebral haemorrhage@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Metformin Attenuates Neurological Deficit after Intracerebral Hemorrhage by Inhibiting Apoptosis, Oxidative Stress and Neuroinflammation in Rats.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ were randomly divided into three groups: sham group, @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@ group, and @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group.
